channel.title: acf on smutek.net
channel.description: Recent content in acf on smutek.net

item.title: Rich Semantic Titles in WordPress with ACF
item.description: Last night while browsing the Roots Discourse I came across a cool share by a user who has written a little utility to handle a request he often gets from designers and content creators. User MWDelaney writes - So he wrote this cool little plugin that gives end users a set of fields to construct these complex titles. The post is here, and you can check his plugin out here. I’d suggest exploring his GitHub further as it looks like he’s working on lot’s of cool ideas like this.

item.title: A little function for oEmbed + ACF
item.description: We’ve been doing a lot of videos on our sites lately. Well, we’ve always done a lot of videos on our sites. The model is usually an on-page embed, either directly in page or via a modal, and we set the back-end up to use the oEmbed field in Advanced Custom Fields Pro. It gives a great back-end experience - and why use WordPress if it’s not going to be user configurable, right?
